title: Lemon and coconut loaf cake
ingredients: ['For the loaf cake', '200g caster sugar', '120g butter, softened', '2 eggs', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '200g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '120ml milk', '40g flaked or dessicated coconut', 'For the lemon drizzle', '100g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons lemon juice, or more as needed']
